main_h2: Chic and Cozy: Style and Warmth in One!
prod_description: This women's sheepskin jacket exudes timeless elegance and warmth. Crafted from high-quality genuine sheepskin, it features a plush shearling lining and a sleek leather exterior. The tailored silhouette and asymmetrical zipper add a touch of modern flair. Whether you're strolling through the city or heading to a countryside getaway, this jacket is the perfect blend of style and comfort.
prod_properties: Available in three sizes: S, M, and L and two classic colors: black and brown.
